sqlMap.statement: SELECT SSO.SRCH_OPT_PK ,SSO.SRCH_OPT_NM FROM SAVE_SRCH_OPT SSO WHERE SSO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SSO.SRCH_OPT_APL_ID = #srchOptAplId# AND SSO.SRCH_OPT_USR_ID = #srchOptUsrId# AND SSO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SSO.SRCH_OPT_NM ASC

SELECT PRT.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD ,PRT.PRCH_REQ_TP_DESC_TXT FROM PRCH_REQ_TP PRT WHERE PRT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRT.PRCH_REQ_REC_TP_CD = #poRequisition# AND PRT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PRT.PRCH_REQ_TP_SORT_NUM ASC

SELECT PRST.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD ,PRST.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_DESC_TXT FROM PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_XREF PRSTX ,PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP PRST WHERE PRSTX.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRSTX.PRCH_REQ_REC_TP_CD = #prchReqRecTpCd# AND PRSTX.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRST.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRSTX.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD = PRST.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD AND PRSTX.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PRST.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_SORT_NUM ASC
SELECT PG.PRCH_GRP_CD ,PG.PRCH_GRP_DESC_TXT FROM PRCH_GRP PG WHERE PG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PG.PRCH_GRP_CD ASC

SELECT -- 08/10/2017 CITS H.Naoi Add MRP_PLN_NM Sol 097 QC18398 A.PRCH_REQ_NUM_H ,A.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD ,A.PRCH_REQ_STS_CD ,A.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_CD ,A.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_DT ,A.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD ,A.TRX_REF_NUM ,A.MRP_PLN_NM ,A.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_BY_PSN_CD ,A.PRCH_GRP_CD ,A.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD_H ,A.PRCH_REQ_NUM_DT ,A.RQST_RCV_DT ,A.RQST_RCV_TM
,A.RQST_SHIP_DT
,A.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,A.CARR_CD ,A.PRNT_VND_CD ,A.VND_CD ,A.DEST_RTL_WH_CD ,A.DEST_RTL_SWH_CD ,A.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD_DT ,A.PO_ORD_NUM ,A.PRCH_REQ_TP_DESC_TXT ,A.PRCH_REQ_STS_DESC_TXT ,A.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_DESC_TXT ,A.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_DESC_TXT ,NVL2(A.FULL_PSN_NM2,A.FULL_PSN_NM2,A.FULL_PSN_NM) AS FULL_PSN_NM ,A.SHPG_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT ,A.VND_NM1 ,A.PRNT_VND_NM ,A.VND_NM2 ,A.RTL_WH_NM ,A.RTL_SWH_NM ,A.DS_ACCT_NM
,A.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,A.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_NM ,A.MDSE_CD ,A.PRCH_REQ_QTY
,A.PRCH_REQ_DISP_QTY
,A.PO_SCHD_REL_DT ,A.PRCH_REQ_REL_DT_TM_TS ,A.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,A.COA_MDSE_TP_CD ,A.COA_PROD_CD
FROM( SELECT DISTINCT PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM PRCH_REQ_NUM_H ,PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD ,PR.PRCH_REQ_STS_CD ,PR.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_CD ,PR.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_DT ,PR.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD ,PR.TRX_REF_NUM ,PR.MRP_PLN_NM ,PR.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_BY_PSN_CD ,PR.PRCH_GRP_CD ,PR.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD SHIP_TO_CUST_CD_H ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM PRCH_REQ_NUM_DT ,PRD.RQST_RCV_DT ,PRD.RQST_RCV_TM
,PRD.RQST_SHIP_DT
,PRD.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,PRD.CARR_CD ,PRD.PRNT_VND_CD ,PRD.VND_CD ,PRD.DEST_RTL_WH_CD ,PRD.DEST_RTL_SWH_CD ,PR.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD SHIP_TO_CUST_CD_DT ,PRD.PO_ORD_NUM ,PRT.PRCH_REQ_TP_DESC_TXT ,PRS.PRCH_REQ_STS_DESC_TXT ,PRAS.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_DESC_TXT ,PRST.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_DESC_TXT ,TRIM(AP.FIRST_NM) || ' ' || TRIM(AP.LAST_NM) AS FULL_PSN_NM ,SSUL.FULL_PSN_NM AS FULL_PSN_NM2 ,SSL.SHPG_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT ,VND1.LOC_NM VND_NM1 ,PV.PRNT_VND_NM ,VND2.LOC_NM VND_NM2 ,RW.RTL_WH_NM ,RSW.RTL_SWH_NM ,PR.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM DS_ACCT_NM
,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,PRLS.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_NM ,CASE WHEN MDSE.MDSE_ITEM_TP_CD = #mdseItemTpCd# THEN NULL ELSE PRD.MDSE_CD END AS MDSE_CD ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_QTY
,PRD.PRCH_REQ_DISP_QTY
,PRD.PO_SCHD_REL_DT ,SUBSTRB(PRD.PRCH_REQ_REL_DT_TM_TS, 1, 8) AS PRCH_REQ_REL_DT_TM_TS
,CASE WHEN PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_TP_CD IN(#prchReqLineTpCdExpenseWReceipt#, #prchReqLineTpCdExpense#) THEN NVL(PRD.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT, MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT) ELSE MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT END AS MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,MDSE.COA_MDSE_TP_CD ,MDSE.COA_PROD_CD
FROM PRCH_REQ PR ,PRCH_REQ_DTL PRD ,MDSE MDSE ,PRCH_REQ_TP PRT ,PRCH_REQ_STS PRS ,PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS PRAS ,PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP PRST ,PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS PRLS ,AUTH_PSN AP ,SHPG_SVC_LVL SSL ,VND VND1 ,PRNT_VND PV ,VND VND2 ,RTL_WH RW ,RTL_SWH RSW ,SCE_SYS_USR_LIST SSUL WHERE PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PR.PRCH_REQ_REC_TP_CD = #poRequisition# AND PR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM = PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM AND PRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRD.MDSE_CD = MDSE.MDSE_CD AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD = PRT.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD(+) AND PRT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_STS_CD = PRS.PRCH_REQ_STS_CD(+) AND PRS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRAS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_CD = PRAS.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_CD(+) AND PRAS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRST.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD = PRST.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD(+) AND PRST.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_CD = PRLS.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_CD(+) AND PRLS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_BY_PSN_CD = AP.USR_NM(+) AND AP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSUL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_BY_PSN_CD = SSUL.FULL_PSN_NM(+) AND SSUL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = SSL.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD(+) AND SSL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VND1.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.CARR_CD = VND1.VND_CD(+) AND VND1.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.PRNT_VND_CD = PV.PRNT_VND_CD(+) AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VND2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.VND_CD = VND2.VND_CD(+) AND VND2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.DEST_RTL_WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD(+) AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RSW.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRD.DEST_RTL_SWH_CD = RSW.RTL_SWH_CD(+) AND RW.RTL_WH_CD = RSW.RTL_WH_CD(+) AND RSW.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM = #cMsg.prchReqNum#
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD = #cMsg.prchReqTpCd_SL#
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_STS_CD = #cMsg.prchReqStsCd_SL#
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_APVL_STS_CD = #cMsg.prchReqApvlStsCd_SL#
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_DT >= #cMsg.prchReqCratDt_FR#
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_CRAT_DT <= #cMsg.prchReqCratDt_TO#
AND PR.PRCH_REQ_SRC_TP_CD = #cMsg.prchReqSrcTpCd_SL#
AND PR.TRX_REF_NUM LIKE #cMsg.trxRefNum#
AND PR.MRP_PLN_NM LIKE #cMsg.mrpPlnNm#
AND PR.PRCH_GRP_CD = #cMsg.prchGrpCd_SL#
AND PR.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD LIKE #cMsg.shipToCustCd#
AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_CD = #cMsg.prchReqLineStsCd_SL#
AND PRD.RQST_RCV_DT >= #cMsg.rqstRcvDt_FR#
AND PRD.RQST_RCV_DT <= #cMsg.rqstRcvDt_TO#
AND PRD.RQST_SHIP_DT >= #cMsg.rqstShipDt_FR#
AND PRD.RQST_SHIP_DT <= #cMsg.rqstShipDt_TO#
AND PRD.MDSE_CD LIKE #cMsg.mdseCd#
AND MDSE.COA_MDSE_TP_CD LIKE #cMsg.coaMdseTpCd#
AND MDSE.COA_PROD_CD LIKE #cMsg.coaProdCd#
AND PRD.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = #cMsg.shpgSvcLvlCd_SL#
AND PRD.PRNT_VND_CD LIKE #cMsg.prntVndCd#
AND PRD.VND_CD LIKE #cMsg.vndCd#
AND PRD.DEST_RTL_WH_CD LIKE #cMsg.destRtlWhCd#
AND PRD.DEST_RTL_SWH_CD LIKE #cMsg.destRtlSwhCd#
AND PRD.PO_ORD_NUM = #cMsg.poOrdNum#
AND ( UPPER(TRIM(AP.FIRST_NM)) || ' ' || UPPER(TRIM(AP.LAST_NM)) LIKE UPPER(TRIM(#cMsg.fullPsnNm#)) OR UPPER(SSUL.FULL_PSN_NM) LIKE UPPER(#cMsg.fullPsnNm#) )
AND VND1.LOC_NM LIKE #cMsg.carrNm#
AND PV.PRNT_VND_NM LIKE #cMsg.prntVndNm#
AND VND2.LOC_NM LIKE #cMsg.vndNm#
AND RW.RTL_WH_NM LIKE #cMsg.rtlWhNm#
AND RSW.RTL_SWH_NM LIKE #cMsg.rtlSwhNm#
AND PR.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM LIKE #cMsg.shipToLocNm#
ORDER BY PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM ASC
,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#
